             <div class="product-state__price-btn menu-product__price-btn menu-product__price-btn--active" gog-track-event='{eventAction: "addToCart {{ games.selectedCategory.name }} {{ $index + 1 }}-3", eventCategory: "topBar", eventLabel: "{{ product.title }}"}' ng-class="{

     <div class="menu-item menu-item--invisible-on-loading menu-notifications has-submenu js-menu-notifications" hook-test="menuNotifications" ng-cloak="" ng-controller="menuNotificationsCtrl as notifications" ng-show="notifications.isVisible">
      <a class="menu-link menu-link--icon" hook-test="menuNotificationsButton" ng-class="{ 'is-notifying': notifications.newNotificationAnimation }" ng-click="menu.toggle($event, 'notifications', true)" ng-mouseenter="menu.cancelTimeout('notifications')" ng-mouseleave="menu.hide($event, 'notifications', 600)">
       <svg class="menu-icon-svg menu-icon-svg--notifications" ng-class="{ 'got-notification': notifications.newNotificationAnimation }" viewbox="0 0 15 16">
        <use xlink:href="#icon-notification">
        </use>
       </svg>
       <span class="menu-item__count menu-item__count--notifications" ng-bind="notifications.notificationsCountLabel" ng-class="{ 'is-highlighted': notifications.haveNewNotifications }">
       </span>
       <span class="menu-triangle menu-triangle--centered menu-triangle--others">
       </span>
      </a>
      <div class="menu-submenu menu-notifications__submenu" ng-mouseenter="menu.cancelTimeout('notifications')" ng-mouseleave="menu.hideOnMouseleave($event, 'notifications', 600)">
       <div class="menu-header menu-header-notifications" ng-class="{

                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="menu-product__details" ng-bind-html="((result.releaseDate * 1000) | date:'yyyy')+', '+result.developer+', '+result.publisher | highlight:search.searchTerm" ng-show="result.releaseDate">
                </div>
                <div class="menu-product__details" ng-bind-html="result.developer+', '+result.publisher | highlight:search.searchTerm" ng-show="!result.releaseDate">
                </div>
                <div class="star-rating menu-product__rating" gog-star-rating="{{ product.rating }}">
                </div>
                <div class="menu-product__os js-os-support">
                 <span ng-show="product.isGame">
                  <i class="menu-product__os-icon menu-product__os-icon--windows" ng-show="product.worksOn.Windows">

                  </i>
                 </span>

                 movie
                </div>

                  </span>
                  %
                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </a>
            </div>
